I have over 10 years of professional experience with roles in consulting, product management, and account management - primarily in ecommerce within the tech industry. Most recently I worked in customer success for an ecommerce SaaS startup managing 10 customers totaling about $2.5 million in annual recurring revenue. I've led B2B and B2C enterprise ecommerce implementations and managed discussions with stakeholders to capture business and technical requirements. I have experience working with development teams using agile methodologies and owned requirements to create user stories, plan development sprints,Â conduct testing, and provide sprint demos and training. I have a passion for technology to build superior products while providing best in class user experiences. I value hard work, attention to detail, team collaboration, and making data-driven decisions.

projects.title: Memory Match Game
projects.description: Built a memory matching game that allows a player to click on cards to make matches of images within a time limit.
